modName: The Archers Arsenal - Special Arrows and More
summary: The Archer\'s Arsenal is a lore-friendly mod that aims to enrich the skill of archery by providing more ways to get around your enemy, each with their own pros and cons.
descriptionHtml:
-- No Requirements :D --

The life of an archer in Skyrim can be rather boring and monotonous. Shoot, kill, shoot, kill...you get the point.

The Archer\'s Arsenal is a lore-friendly mod that aims to enrich the skill of archery, providing more ways to get around your enemy, each with their own pros and cons.
Now archers have the ability to poison, burn and blind their enemies, among other methods attributed to the various new arrow types provided in this mod, with MANY more on the way!

Currently available arrows:
- Explosive Arrows
- Magelight Arrows
- Paralysis Arrows
- Poison Arrows
- Soul Trap Arrows
- Superheavy Arrows
- Superlight Arrows

All arrows can be obtained:
- From Fletcher in Solitude or The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
- As loot, from both chests and enemies
- Through crafting at any Blacksmith\'s Forge

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is also available on the Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=114221924&searchtext=

This is my first mod for Skyrim, so all feedback is greatly welcomed and encouraged!

Please rate my mod generously too as I spent a lot of time on this!

If you have any questions feel free to message me!

/Changelog and /Todo are below.


------------------- TO DO -------------------
------(ALL HELP APPRECIATED!!)------
- Fire Arrows (suprisingly difficult)
- Blinding Arrows
- Noisy Arrows (similar to Throw Voice)
- Triple Arrows
- Dawnguard bolts
- Full retuxture
- Magelight arrows to stay illuminated when stuck in an NPC
- Update images on Workshop


--------------- CHANGELOG ---------------
Version 1.5 - 1st January 2013 @ 22:55
- Added Paralysis Arrows to the Arsenal!
- Added Soul Trap Arrows to the Arsenal!
- Optimised the radius\' of many effects.

Version 1.4 - 30th December 2012 @ 16:15
- All arrows are now much harder to obtain; they are more expensive and harder to craft

Version 1.3 - 20th December 2012 @ 21:58
- Increased Magelight glow radius
- Arrows are now available as loot from various monsters
- Fixed Poison Arrow problems

Version 1.2 - 20th December 2012 @ 00:18
- All arrows are now enemy loot obtainable from Bandits, Draugr etc.
- Arrows can now also be purchased from the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun

Version 1.1 - 19th December 2012 @ 23:25
- Arrows are now obtainable through chest loot
- All arrows are now craftable at any forge
- Removed the mysterious floating barrel in Riverwood
author: Kali - McNaggers
